channel.title: Online Tools - 30Tools Updates
channel.description: Latest updates and new tools from the best collection of free online developer tools

item.title: New Hash Tools Added - SHA-3, BLAKE, and more
item.description: We've added powerful new cryptographic hash functions including SHA-3, BLAKE2, BLAKE3, and cSHAKE for enhanced security.

item.title: Enhanced Encryption Tools
item.description: New AES, DES, Triple DES, and RC4 encryption/decryption tools with multiple modes and key formats.
